summary: Rekicker\'s excellent Snow Leopard Forsworn Armour reduced to the absolute minimum!
descriptionHtml:
I like it short and tiny... very short and tiny.. rediculously so maybe, but what the heck.

This mod is a modification of Rekicker\'s Snow Leopard Forsworn Armour (non-replacer version). This mod is basically a retextured version of that entire mod, however, it works only with a modified version of Thepal\'s nude mod. This is necessary to prevent a conspicuous Nipple Slip problem. 

I packaged this mod into 2 options, containing 2 versions of the modified Nude mod by Thepal. One version is \'nude\', and another with micro panty/thong, meant mainly for use with the \'drafty\' version of the Snow leopard cuirass.
The pictures attached show this option i.e. the drafty cuirass with panty. (my personal preference)

NOTE: 
If you are using a Male Character, this mod won\'t do anything for you.
I did not modify the Nude Mod for the Beast Races.
The Nude mod component will have to overwrite any current nude mod/skin texture mod you may be currently using, so please be warned / or back your current files.
Alternatively there is always the possibility of installing only the armour component if you don\'t mind the nipple slip.


INSTALL (as per Rekicker\'s mod description)

1. Drop everything in the Data folder into your Data folder. 

Do not include the following folders if you do not want to install the Nude Mod component:
- meshes\\actors\\character\\character assets
- textures\\actors\\character\\female

2. Make sure you check the SnowLeopardForsworn.esp to be loaded.

3. Buy the items, available at the Drunken Huntsman in Whiterun.

-OR-

4. Use the console to gain the items:

The \"XX\" may be 00, 01, 02, 03, etc. Just keep trying, don\'t give up! Or do give up. It\'s easier.

\"player.additem XXdead01 1\" to get Snow Leopard Forsworn Cuirass (Skimpy but Covered)
\"player.additem XXdead02 1\" to get Snow Leopard Forsworn Gauntlets
\"player.additem XXdead03 1\" to get Snow Leopard Forsworn Boots
\"player.additem XXdead04 1\" to get Snow Leopard Forsworn Topless (Loincloth Only)
\"player.additem XXdead05 1\" to get Snow Leopard Forsworn No Panties (Drafty)
\"player.additem XXdead06 1\" to get Snow Leopard Forsworn No Bra and No Undies (Bouncy and Drafty)
\"player.additem XXdead07 1\" to get Snow Leopard Forsworn Undies but No Bra (Bouncy)

5. All items can be improved at a workbench. 


UNINSTALLING

To uninstall, just remove the installed files. These will be located in:

Armour
- Data\\SnowLeopardForsworn.esp
- Data\\meshes\\clothes\\slforsworn
- Data\\textures\\armor\\slforsworn

Nude mod
- Data\\meshes\\actors\\character\\character assets
- Data\\textures\\actors\\character\\female


PERMISSION
Feel free to modify / improve on this mod. I merely modified other people\'s mods, so I figure there\'s no reason why I should restrict anyone from modifying mine.

PS. This is my very first Mod upload. I\'m entitled to stupid mistakes and less than stellar work. Do not come after me if this thing screws up your game :D

EDIT: I see some user submitted pics, nice!! More are welcome! :D

Black Version of the Drafty Cuirass uploaded. It is not standalone, will need main files installed first.

Black version of the Loincloth uploaded.
author: getcape
